name: Brazil
interesting_fact: Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, which produces 20% of the world's oxygen.

name: Canada
interesting_fact: Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world.

name: India
interesting_fact: India is the world's largest democracy.

name: Australia
interesting_fact: Australia is home to the world's largest coral reef, the Great Barrier Reef.

name: Germany
interesting_fact: Germany is known for its famous Oktoberfest beer festival.

name: Egypt
interesting_fact: Egypt is home to the Great Pyramid of Giza, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.

name: South Africa
interesting_fact: South Africa has three capital cities: Pretoria (executive), Bloemfontein (judicial), and Cape Town (legislative).

name: Mexico
interesting_fact: Mexico introduced chocolate, chilies, and corn to the world.

name: Russia
interesting_fact: Russia is the largest country in the world by land area.

name: France
interesting_fact: France is the most visited country in the world.

name: China
interesting_fact: China has the world's longest wall, the Great Wall of China, stretching over 13,000 miles.
